entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
